name: Open-pit Quarries
description: Large excavations for building stone and minerals provide essential construction materials. The massive scale creates employment and economic activity, while the environmental damage and dangerous conditions create health and safety risks.
atmosphere: Terraced excavations descend into the earth while heavy equipment extracts valuable stone and minerals. Dust clouds mark blasting operations as construction materials pile in organized stockpiles. The air carries stone dust and industrial activity. Massive scale of extraction provides essential building materials.
